Waltham.Franklin School (Lexington, Massachusett: Lexington High School is a public high school located in Lexington, Massachusetts, United States, serving students in ninth through twelfth grades. Its students generally attended one of the town's two 6th-8th grade middle schools, Jonas Clarke Middle School and William Diamond Middle School. In turn, Clarke is fed by three of the town's six elementary schools: Bowman, Bridge, and Harrington, while Diamond is fed by the other three: Estabrook, Fiske, and Hastings.
